verbs.description: New York Times columnist David Brooks [V: has] committed the unpardonable sin in liberal eyes of expressing support for President Donald Trump 's foreign policy . Even though he described Trump as coming from a " thug " background , showing any support , even of a grudging variety , for Trump is quite surprising considering Brooks ' extreme Never Trumper background .
